briefdescription.para: Copy constructor, creates a new field with the same size and data as the parsed field.

parameterdescription.para: The field to copy from.

briefdescription.para: Destroy the Field object.
applies a functor, transformation, to the field

parameterdescription.para: The functor to map over the field.

simplesect.para: Ideally the f should be a KOKKOS_LAMBA

briefdescription.para: Copies the data to a new field on a specific executor.

parameterdescription.para: The executor on which the data should be copied.

simplesect.para: A copy of the field on the host.

briefdescription.para: Returns a copy of the field back to the host.

simplesect.para: A copy of the field on the host.

briefdescription.para: Copies the data (from anywhere) to a parsed host field.

parameterdescription.para: The field into which the data must be copied. Must be sized.

simplesect.para: exits if the size of the result field is not the same as the source field.

briefdescription.para: Assignment operator, Sets the field values to that of the passed value.

parameterdescription.para: The value to set the field to.

briefdescription.para: Assignment operator, Sets the field values to that of the parsed field.

parameterdescription.para: The field to copy from.

simplesect.para: This field will be sized to the size of the parsed field.

briefdescription.para: Arithmetic add operator, addition of a second field.

parameterdescription.para: The field to add with this field.

simplesect.para: The result of the addition.

briefdescription.para: Arithmetic subtraction operator, subtraction by a second field.

parameterdescription.para: The field to subtract from this field.

simplesect.para: The result of the subtraction.

briefdescription.para: Arithmetic multiply operator, multiply by a second field.

parameterdescription.para: The field to subtract from this field.

simplesect.para: The result of the multiply.

briefdescription.para: Arithmetic multiply operator, multiplies every cell in the field by a scalar.

parameterdescription.para: The scalar to multiply with the field.

simplesect.para: The result of the multiplication.

briefdescription.para: Resizes the field to a new size.

parameterdescription.para: The new size to set the field to.

briefdescription.para: Direct access to the underlying field data.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the first cell data in the field.

briefdescription.para: Gets the executor associated with the field.

simplesect.para: True if the field is empty, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: A class to contain the data and executors for a field and define some basic operations.
